page.title: 18Leisure Time in Loughton
page.content: One of the favorite leisure pursuits we have now is{computer games}and t.v. In a survey of 11 year olds we found that many children watch over 30 hours of{t.v.}per week. Many older people like pubs and fishing and there are other things that go on all year round. In Winter we do sledging and a recent popular pastime in summer is B.M.X. bike riding. Some people like gardening while others prefer more active pursuits like going swimming. The{scouts and guides}are very popular in Loughton and they go on camps and do lots of activities.{Football}is very popular in schools and Loughton Boys run a number of teams for boys of all ages. Keep-fit is popular with women and they can go to one of a number of clubs.
